data.title: When cross-compiling, double check if the native compiler toolchain is also available before proceeding
data.body: [All done] Rather than generated a build tree that could not build later, the check should be done up front.

data.title: Update libcpuid to 0.2.2
Use _WIN32 for code consistency
Added Texture2DArray.
option -DURHO3D_LIB_TYPE=SHARED is still reporting Build Shared Library: OFF
data.body:
vs2015, win7, when running cmake_vs2015.bat -DURHO3D_LIB_TYPE=SHARED, it still reports:

--  Build Shared Library: OFF
--  Build Static Library: ON

data.title: Complete PBR work
data.body:
Included PBR Rendering for OpenGL and DirectX. Supported renderpaths include Forward and Deferred. Finally there is a new example scene included.

![screenshot_thu_mar_31_20_26_27_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/14189691/837b001e-f786-11e5-87a8-a7843650f1b1.png)
![screenshot_thu_mar_31_20_26_35_2016](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3044415/14189693/85471928-f786-11e5-85c6-efcdea2fc527.png)

data.title: sincosf
data.body:
Latest master of urho3D
Compiler: minGW TDM-GCC-32
WinXP with C::B
file urho3D/math/mathdefs.h:171

```

#ifndef __GNUC__
    sin = sinf(angleRadians);
    cos = cosf(angleRadians);
#else
    #ifdef __APPLE__
        __sincosf(angleRadians, &sin, &cos);
    #else
        sincosf(angleRadians, &sin, &cos);
    #endif
#endif

```

Error:  sincosf not defined in scope
Changed it to:
# if 1

it worked

Linux build works as is

I'm not that familiar with the code base

data.title: Fix URHO3D_SSE definition to allow toggling SSE in Bullet
Aggregate initializer constructors for container types
data.body:
Discussed [here](http://urho3d.prophpbb.com/topic1988.html). This includes only constructors, `SendEvent()` with const `VariantMap` is not included. They are only active if urho3d is built with `-DURHO3D_C++11` and are disabled on compilers that do not use c++11.

Also piggy-backed few small commits that seemed not worthy of their own PR:
- Added `.directory` files to `.gitignore` as KDE/plasma stores folder settings in there.
- Added `URHO3D_API` to `ValueAnimationInfo` class declaration so it is exposed in shared library.

data.title: Rework ScriptInstance hot reload
data.body: When a ScriptInstance is hot-reloaded, its attributes are not instantly restored. There is specialized support code for script attributes in the editor that shouldn't be necessary if ScriptInstance handled its hot-reload / restore properly.

data.title: fix issues of Octree::Update while it working with ThreadedUpdate enabled.
data.body: drawableUpdates_ will be broken if it working with ThreadedUpdate enabled.

data.title: wrong judgement in  AnimatedSprite2D::SetAnimationSet()
Initialize correctly all DetourCrowd and DetourTileCache members
(Web) Urho3DPlayer lua sample from query string
data.body: (Web) Added ability to select a lua sample in Urho3DPlayer via the browser address query string, eg: Urho3DPlayer.html?sample=4 will load the LuaScripts/04_StaticScene.lua sample. By default and in error cases, 01_HelloWorld is shown.

data.title: Fix link issue in readme markdown
For Travis CI - OSX VM running out of disk space after Travis recent upgrade
data.body:
See here for more detail. https://blog.travis-ci.com/2016-03-23-xcode-image-updates
If Travis team does not respond quick enough then we will have to workaround the problem ourselves by adding a small script logic to remove Java at the start of the VM.

data.title: Moved container begin and end from std to Urho3D namespace
data.body: This replaces #1274, now using its own branch.

data.title: Fix signed/unsigned mismatch in FontFaceFreeType.cpp
Add missing Italian localization entries
Add missing Italian localization entries
Update pugixml from 1.5 to 1.7
Remove extra stb header
"MatDiffColor" not available if defined only in material file
data.body:
A have material

```
<material>
    <technique name="Techniques/DiffUnlitAlpha.xml"/>
    <texture unit="diffuse" name="Textures/Line.png" />
    <parameter name="MatDiffColor" value="1 1 0.5 1"/>
    <cull value="none" />
</material>
```

Result of

```
auto material = cache->GetResource<Material>("Materials/Line.xml")->Clone(); 
```

is orange material, it is normal

If in game I use

```
    auto material = cache->GetResource<Material>("Materials/Line.xml")->Clone();
    auto color = material->GetShaderParameter("MatDiffColor").GetColor();
    material->SetShaderParameter("MatDiffColor", color);
```

result is a white material ("MatDiffColor" not founded and return white as default)

If I set color in code

```
    auto material = cache->GetResource<Material>("Materials/Line.xml")->Clone();
    material->SetShaderParameter("MatDiffColor", Color(1, 0, 0));
    auto color = material->GetShaderParameter("MatDiffColor").GetColor();
    material->SetShaderParameter("MatDiffColor", color);
```

GetShaderParameter("MatDiffColor") works normally

data.title: Remove unused STB headers
Fix wrong directory path to JSONValue
Fix macro ident space
Moved container begin and end from std to Urho3D namespace
data.body:
This makes range based for loops work for me.
When begin and end are in the std namespace I get compiler errors saying they have not been declared.

data.title: AssetImporter can import a subset animation frames.
data.body:
Example:
c:/>AssetImporter model xxx.fbx xxx.mdl -split 10 40

You will get a .ani file only with subanimation from frame 10 to frame 40.

data.title: BillboardSet::UpdateVertexBuffer optimization
data.body: Made the sine calculations there much faster in two steps. That brought the big loop there down from 22.03ms to 8.25ms and the total FPS from 20 to 24 in my test scene.
